text:
A former collegue of mine, who works at the same company I used to work for (called Framestore), had previously worked in high end digital photo retouching before landing her job at Framestore as a Digital Matte Painter:

<https://www.cosmopolitan.com/uk/worklife/campus/a20963773/visual-effects-jobs-advice/>

attachments.title: How I got my first job in: Visual Effects
attachments.text: Laura is working on projects like Thor: Ragnarok and Fantastic Beasts 2. How did she get there?
attachments.fallback: Cosmopolitan: How I got my first job in: Visual Effects
